trans-unit.source: An enumeration that specifies handling for a poison message.
trans-unit.target: En opplisting som angir behandling for en giftmelding.

trans-unit.source: A poison message is a message that fails repeated attempts to deliver to the application.
trans-unit.target: En giftmelding er en melding som ikke gjentatte forsøk på å levere til programmet.

trans-unit.source: This is applicable only when using a Message Queuing (MSMQ)-based binding.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjelder bare når du bruker en Message Queuing MSMQ-baserte binding.

trans-unit.source: The default value is `Fault`, which faults the listener and therefore the ServiceHost.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er `Fault`, som faults lytteren, og derfor ServiceHost.

trans-unit.source: In the case where the service was to fault because of a poison message, a <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: I tilfeller der tjenesten var feil på grunn av en giftmelding en <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException>forårsakes.</xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException>

trans-unit.source: The exception contains the `LookupId` of the MSMQ message that can be used to move the message out of the way using System.Messaging API.
trans-unit.target: Unntaket inneholder den `LookupId` for MSMQ-melding som kan brukes til å flytte melding i veien ved bruk av System.Messaging API.

trans-unit.source: Certain values of the ReceiveErrorHandling enumeration such as `Reject` and `Move` are only available on [!INCLUDE[wv](~/add/includes/wv-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Bestemte verdier på ReceiveErrorHandling-opplisting som `Reject` og `Move` er bare tilgjengelige på [!INCLUDE[wv](~/add/includes/wv-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: You control poison message handling by setting the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqBindingElementBase.ReceiveErrorHandling%2A> property to one of the values of this enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Du kontrollerer Giftmelding behandler ved å angi den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqBindingElementBase.ReceiveErrorHandling%2A>til en av verdiene i denne opplisting.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqBindingElementBase.ReceiveErrorHandling%2A>

trans-unit.source: This option drops the poison message.
trans-unit.target: Dette alternativet faller giftmelding.

trans-unit.source: The message never gets delivered to the application.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen henter aldri leveres til programmet.

trans-unit.source: If the message's TTL had already expired at this point, then the message may appear in the sender's Dead Letter Queue.
trans-unit.target: Hvis meldingens TTL har allerede utløpt på dette tidspunktet, kan meldingen vises i avsenderens blindkøen.

trans-unit.source: If not, the message does not appear anywhere.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, meldingen vises ikke hvor som helst.

trans-unit.source: This option indicates that the user does not really care if the message is lost.
trans-unit.target: Dette alternativet angir at brukeren ikke virkelig hånd Hvis meldingen går tapt.

trans-unit.source: Applicable platforms: [!INCLUDE[wxp](~/add/includes/wxp-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[ws2003](~/add/includes/ws2003-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[wv](~/add/includes/wv-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende plattformer: [!INCLUDE[wxp](~/add/includes/wxp-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[ws2003](~/add/includes/ws2003-md.md)], og [!INCLUDE[wv](~/add/includes/wv-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: This option sends a fault to the listener that caused the ServiceHost to fault.
trans-unit.target: Dette alternativet sender en feil for lytteren som forårsaket ServiceHost til feil.

trans-unit.source: The message must be removed from the application queue by some external mechanism before the application can continue to process messages from the queue.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen må fjernes fra programmet køen av en ekstern mekanisme før programmet fortsetter å behandle fra en kø.

trans-unit.source: Applicable platforms: Windows XP, Windows Server 2003, and Windows Vista.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende plattformer: Windows XP, Windows Server 2003 og Windows Vista.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: This moves the poison message to a Poison Message Queue for later processing by a poison message handling application.
trans-unit.target: Dette flytter Giftmelding til en Poison meldingskøen for behandling av en giftmelding behandler programmet senere.

trans-unit.source: Applicable platforms: [!INCLUDE[wv](~/add/includes/wv-md.md)] only.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende plattformer: [!INCLUDE[wv](~/add/includes/wv-md.md)] bare.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: This instructs MSMQ to send a negative acknowledgement back to the sending queue manager that the message cannot be received by the application.
trans-unit.target: Dette angir at MSMQ å sende en negativ bekreftelse tilbake til sende købehandlingen at meldingen ikke kan motta av programmet.

trans-unit.source: The message is placed in the sending queue manager's Dead Letter Queue.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen er plassert i den sende købehandlingen blindkøen.

trans-unit.source: Applicable platforms: [!INCLUDE[wv](~/add/includes/wv-md.md)] only.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende plattformer: [!INCLUDE[wv](~/add/includes/wv-md.md)] bare.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
